gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 123, Pelicans 105
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks defeated the Pelicans, 123-105 tonight in New Orleans. Trae Young finished with a team-high 22 points along with 12 assists and five rebounds for the Hawks, while Jalen Johnson tallied 21 points, 11 rebounds and four assists in the game. Zion Williamson recorded 25 points, five rebounds and three assists. The Hawks improve their record to 4-2 with the win, while the Pelicans fall to 4-2 for the season.
